translated: The aggregates of other continuums and of those who are not counted among sentient beings are not the basis of consciousness, even though they are of the same continuum.

original: gzhan dag na re de dag kyang rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re de dag kyang rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: Others say that they are not the basis of consciousness,

original: de la yang rnam par shes pa nye bar brlan pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de la yang rnam par shes pa nye bar brlan pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: because consciousness is not moistened and nourished by them.

original: gnas pa po yongs su spangs nas zhes bya ba ni gnas pa po ma gtogs par ro //
analyzed: gnas pa po yongs su spangs nas zhes bya ba ni gnas pa po ma gtogs par ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúexcluding the one who is abiding‚Äù means excluding the one who is abiding in the present.

original: gnas pa po lha sbyin la sogs pa yang gzhan yin zhing gnas pa yang gzhan yin pa gang yin pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa po lha sbyin la sogs pa yang gzhan yin zhing gnas pa yang gzhan yin pa gang yin pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du mthong ba yin te /
translated: The one who abides, such as Devadatta, is one thing, and the place where he abides is another.

original: khyim la sogs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyim la sogs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is seen in the world, such as a house, etc.

original: 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'jug par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'jug par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one who goes is the one who moves.

original: gru dang mnyan pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mnyan pa gru 'gro bar byed pa lta bu ste de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gru dang mnyan pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mnyan pa gru 'gro bar byed pa lta bu ste de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The one who goes is the one who moves, like a boatman is the one who moves a boat.üîΩConsciousness does not go, abiding in consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par shes pa la gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyud gcig la rnam par shes pa'i rdzas dag phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par shes pa la gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyud gcig la rnam par shes pa'i rdzas dag phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Consciousness does not go, abiding in consciousness, because there is no contact between two substances of consciousness in one continuum.

original: gal te yang rgyud gzhan gyi rnam par shes pa ni dus gcig tu yod mod kyi de ni gzhan dang nye bar 'jug pa ma yin pas de yang de'i gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang rgyud gzhan gyi rnam par shes pa ni dus gcig tu yod mod kyi de ni gzhan dang nye bar 'jug pa ma yin pas de yang de'i gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if the consciousness of another continuum exists at the same time, it is not the support of this consciousness, because it does not function in relation to it.

original: 'o na mdo las zhes bya ba 'dis ni rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin par bshad do zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'o na mdo las zhes bya ba 'dis ni rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin par bshad do zhes ston to //
translated: But this passage from the sutra shows that consciousness is also a station of consciousness.

original: dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
translated: Joy is mental satisfaction.üîΩThe seven stations of consciousness are by nature the five aggregates.

original: rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun phung po lnga'i rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bya ba de yang ji lta bu zhes bya ba 'dis ni yang mdo dang 'gal bar ston to /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun phung po lnga'i rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bya ba de yang ji lta bu zhes bya ba 'dis ni yang mdo dang 'gal bar ston to /
translated: How is this? This shows that this passage from the sutra is not contradictory.

original: 'di la rnam par shes pa gnas pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la rnam par shes pa gnas pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the station of consciousness here?

original: de dag dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga dang gzhi yin no zhes bshad na /
analyzed: de dag dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga dang gzhi yin no zhes bshad na /
translated: It is the five aggregates associated with that consciousness and their basis.

original: gal te gnas pa lnga po yongs su spangs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba ni de ji lta bu yin /
analyzed: gal te gnas pa lnga po yongs su spangs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba ni de ji lta bu yin /
translated: If the five stations are completely abandoned, what is the station of consciousness?

original: de lta na 'o na ni bye brag med par zhes bya ba ni mdo dang bstan bcos dag dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni bye brag med par zhes bya ba ni mdo dang bstan bcos dag dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is not contradictory to the sutra and the treatise.

original: bye brag med par ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par med pa ste /
analyzed: bye brag med par ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par med pa ste /
translated: Without distinction means without differentiation.

original: lnga char la yang zhes bya @269a * //
analyzed: lnga char la yang zhes bya @269a * //
translated: All five are the station of consciousness.

original: ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúarising‚Äù is the same as that of ‚Äúbirth.‚Äù

original: skye ba'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i phung po dag la zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'i ris kyis bsdus pa dus gsum pa dag la'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i phung po dag la zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'i ris kyis bsdus pa dus gsum pa dag la'o //
translated: The aggregates that are included in the birth base are those included in the class of humans, etc., and they exist in the three times.

original: mngon par dga' ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚ÄúAlong with the delight‚Äù means

original: mngon par dga' ba ni yid bde ba nyon mongs pa can no //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba ni yid bde ba nyon mongs pa can no //
translated: delight is afflicted mental satisfaction.

original: so sor dbye na zhes bya ba ni phung po re re la ste /
analyzed: so sor dbye na zhes bya ba ni phung po re re la ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf you analyze‚Äù means in regard to each of the aggregates.

original: ji ltar rten dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i ngo bor nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs la sogs pa dag rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig logs su ni de
analyzed: ji ltar rten dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i ngo bor nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs la sogs pa dag rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig logs su ni de
translated: Just as form, etc., are the afflictions of consciousness because they approach it in the nature of a basis, an object, an association, and a co-existence, consciousness alone is not that way.

original: lta ma yin te ci zhe na ;
analyzed: lta ma yin te ci zhe na ;
translated: What is it not?

original: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin te zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin te zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is not the affliction of the aggregates.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: cig car rten nyid la sogs par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig car rten nyid la sogs par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is illogical that they would be simultaneous supports and so on.

original: de lta bas na rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi bstan par rnam shes 'ba' zhig logs su gnas par ma bshad do //üîΩgzhan yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de lta bas na rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi bstan par rnam shes 'ba' zhig logs su gnas par ma bshad do // gzhan yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Therefore, in the teaching of the four abodes of consciousness, consciousness alone is not taught to exist separately.

original: der ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi ngo bor ma bstan gyi 'dis ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi ngo bor bstan la /
analyzed: der ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi ngo bor ma bstan gyi 'dis ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi ngo bor bstan la /
translated: Moreover, the seven abodes of consciousness are not taught to be the field of consciousness, but rather the four abodes of consciousness are taught to be the field of consciousness.

original: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi ngo bor bstan to //üîΩsa bon nyid sa bon gyi zhing gi ngo bor zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi ngo bor bstan to // sa bon nyid sa bon gyi zhing gi ngo bor zhes bya ba la /
translated: And consciousness with appropriating is taught to be the seed.üîΩThe seed itself is not the field of the seed.

original: sa bon nyid ni zhing ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sa bon nyid ni zhing ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The seed itself is not the field of the seed.

original: chos gang dag ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: chos gang dag ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúany phenomena‚Äù refers to

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos gang dag rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba de dag kho na zhing gi ngo bor ches legs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos gang dag rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba de dag kho na zhing gi ngo bor ches legs pa yin no //
translated: The form, etc., that occur simultaneously with consciousness are the best as the nature of the field.

original: sa bon dang zhing ni 'jig rten na lhan cig 'byung bar mthong na /
analyzed: sa bon dang zhing ni 'jig rten na lhan cig 'byung bar mthong na /
translated: In the world, seed and field are seen to occur simultaneously.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin te dus gcig tu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin te dus gcig tu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But consciousness does not occur simultaneously with consciousness, because they do not exist at the same time.

original: mu dang po ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mu dang po ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: The first possibility is...

original: mdun du rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mdun du rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The consciousness that is in front of one.

original: rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir der rnam par shes pa 'du'i bzhir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir der rnam par shes pa 'du'i bzhir ni ma yin te /
translated: Since the seven abodes of consciousness have the nature of the five aggregates, consciousness is not included in them.

original: rnam shes 'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do zhes der rnam par shes pa ma 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam shes 'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do zhes der rnam par shes pa ma 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Consciousness is not explained as an abode, because consciousness is not included there.

original: rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i phung po rnams so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i phung po rnams so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The aggregates except for consciousness.

original: ngan song rnams kyi rnam par shes pa ni @269b bzhir ma 'dus shing bdun du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ngan song rnams kyi rnam par shes pa ni @269b bzhir ma 'dus shing bdun du yang ma yin te /
translated: The consciousness of those in the lower realms is not included in the four or seven abodes of consciousness.

original: ngan song rnams su rnam par shes pa 'joms par byed pas ma smos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngan song rnams su rnam par shes pa 'joms par byed pas ma smos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not mentioned because consciousness is destroyed in the lower realms.

original: bdun dag tu phung po bzhi rnams so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdun dag tu phung po bzhi rnams so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The four aggregates are in the seven abodes of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dag tu rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i phung po gang dag bshad pa de rnams ni rnam par shes pa rnam par bdun dang bzhi dag tu yang 'du'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dag tu rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i phung po gang dag bshad pa de rnams ni rnam par shes pa rnam par bdun dang bzhi dag tu yang 'du'o //
translated: The four aggregates that are explained as the abodes of consciousness, excluding consciousness, are included in the seven abodes of consciousness and the four aggregates.üîΩThe fourth is excluded from those.

original: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni ngan song rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par shes pa gang dag yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i phung po rnams so //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni ngan song rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par shes pa gang dag yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i phung po rnams so //
translated: The fourth is excluded from those, which are the consciousnesses of the lower realms, the fourth absorption, and the summit of existence, and the uncontaminated aggregates.

original: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni snod dang / srid pa bar ma dang sa bsdu'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni snod dang / srid pa bar ma dang sa bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúdifferentiated by the distinctions of going, etc.‚Äù includes the distinctions of the womb, the egg, and moisture.

original: khams dang sems can dang sems can du ston pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skye gnas de dag gang gi yin pa mi shes pas /
analyzed: khams dang sems can dang sems can du ston pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skye gnas de dag gang gi yin pa mi shes pas /
translated: Since the elements, sentient beings, and the appearance of sentient beings are not known to belong to any of the birth processes, he says,

original: sems can zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: ‚Äúsentient beings.‚Äù

original: skye gnas dag ni sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye gnas dag ni sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The birth processes are not non-sentient.

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: sgo nga las skyes sogs zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes sogs zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúborn from eggs, etc.‚Äù

original: gang dag la sgo nga las skyes pa dang por yod pa de dag ni sgo nga las skyes sogs so //
analyzed: gang dag la sgo nga las skyes pa dang por yod pa de dag ni sgo nga las skyes sogs so //
translated: Those who are born first from eggs are born from eggs.

original: skye gnas zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi rigs yin gyi skye sa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skye gnas zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi rigs yin gyi skye sa ni ma yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúbirth process‚Äù means a type of sentient being, not a place of birth.

original: sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas ni sgo nga las skyes pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas ni sgo nga las skyes pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The birth process of those born from eggs is the type of sentient being born from eggs.

original: rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same applies up to the miraculous birth.

original: yang don gang gis rigs las skye gnas zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: yang don gang gis rigs las skye gnas zhes brjod ce na /
translated: By what meaning is the place of birth called a species?

original: de'i phyir 'dir sems can rnams 'chol bar 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir sems can rnams 'chol bar 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said here: ‚ÄúSentient beings become confused.‚Äù

original: 'chol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'chol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúbecome confused‚Äù?

original: 'dre bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //
analyzed: 'dre bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúbecome mixed.‚Äù

original: ji ltar 'dre bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dre bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How do they become mixed?

original: skye ba thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skye ba thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of the non-commonality of birth.

original: skye ba chos mthun pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skye ba chos mthun pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: because of the similarity of birth.

original: mngal ni gang gis ma'i ltor na bu gtums nas gnas pa ste /
analyzed: mngal ni gang gis ma'i ltor na bu gtums nas gnas pa ste /
translated: The womb is that by which the child is enclosed and abides in the mother‚Äôs womb.

original: de las skyes pa ni mngal nas skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa ni mngal nas skyes pa'o //
translated: One born from that is born from a womb.

original: 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skyes pa rnams te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skyes pa rnams te zhes bya ba la /
translated: Those born from heat and moisture.

original: 'byung ba lnga la sogs pa rnams kyi drod gsher rgyun chags pa'i mtshan nyid can las skyes pa ni 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skye ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga la sogs pa rnams kyi drod gsher rgyun chags pa'i mtshan nyid can las skyes pa ni 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skye ba rnams so //
translated: Those born from the heat and moisture of the elements are born from the heat and moisture of the elements, which have the characteristic of being a continuous series of the five elements.

original: dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa ni mig la sogs @270a * //üîΩpa ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa ni mig la sogs @270a * // pa ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not incomplete in faculties means that the eye and so on are not incomplete.

original: dbang po dman pa ma yin pa zhar ba dang long ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyan lag thams cad dang ldan pa ni lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa ma yin pa zhar ba dang long ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro // yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa ni lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Not inferior in faculties means that the faculties are not defective, such as being blind or deaf.üîΩPossessing all the major limbs means possessing hands, feet and so on.

original: nying lag dang ldan pa ni mtheb sor la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nying lag dang ldan pa ni mtheb sor la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Possessing all the minor limbs means possessing toes, fingers and so on.

original: sngar gyi rgyu la mi ltos par cig car du skye ba rnams so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sngar gyi rgyu la mi ltos par cig car du skye ba rnams so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Those born spontaneously are born simultaneously without depending on previous causes.

original: sgo nga las skye ba la sogs pa lta bur nur nur po la sogs pa'i rim gyis ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: sgo nga las skye ba la sogs pa lta bur nur nur po la sogs pa'i rim gyis ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: They are not born in stages such as the kalala embryo and so on, like those born from eggs and so on.

original: dang po nyid nas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid nas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: 1. They are not incomplete in their faculties, not defective in their faculties.

original: skye ba la ni 'byung ba la'o //
analyzed: skye ba la ni 'byung ba la'o //

original: skye ba dang / rdzub dang / 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni don gcig ste /
analyzed: skye ba dang / rdzub dang / 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni don gcig ste /
translated: To be born, to be produced, to be generated, have the same meaning.

original: de la mdzes par byed pa'i phyir rdzus te 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: de la mdzes par byed pa'i phyir rdzus te 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: The apparitional beings are so called because they are born suddenly, without the intervention of any intermediate process.üîΩThe apparitional birth is the birth of beings without sex.üîΩThe other births are the birth of beings with sex.

original: 'di dag gi rang bzhin yang rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin /
analyzed: 'di dag gi rang bzhin yang rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin /
translated: All of these births are of two types: they are included in the stream of the five aggregates or in the stream of the four aggregates.üîΩThe apparitional birth is the birth of beings without sex.üîΩThe other births are the birth of beings with sex.üîΩAll of these births are of two types: they are included in the stream of the five aggregates or in the stream of the four aggregates.üîΩThe apparitional beings are of the nature of four or five aggregates.

original: de las gzhan rnams ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin /
analyzed: de las gzhan rnams ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin /
translated: The others are of the nature of five aggregates.

original: thams cad kyang rnam par smin pa dang rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin no //üîΩkhrung khrung mo las skyes pa zhes bya ba rgyas bar 'byung ba la /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rnam par smin pa dang rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin no // khrung khrung mo las skyes pa zhes bya ba rgyas bar 'byung ba la /
translated: All of them are of the nature of the stream of retribution and of the stream of development.üîΩThe two elders, Bhadrika and MahƒÅnƒÅman, were born from the eggs of a ha·πÉsa.üîΩTwo merchants, shipwrecked, had intercourse with a ha·πÉsa.

original: tshong pa gzings zhig pa gnyis rgya mtsho'i dogs su khrung khrung mo dang 'grogs par gyur pa dang / de las gnas brtan brag dang nye brag gnyis skyes so //

translated: From reasoning and from scripture.

original: mi mthun par smra ba'i dngos po la ni gnyis ka nye bar mkho ste rigs pa dang lung ngo //
analyzed: mi mthun par smra ba'i dngos po la ni gnyis ka nye bar mkho ste rigs pa dang lung ngo //
translated: In regard to a disputed entity, both are necessary: reasoning and scripture.

original: ci'i phyir gnyis smos she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gnyis smos she na /
translated: Why are both mentioned?

original: rigs pa dang lung rkyang pa dag tshad ma yin pa'i phyir gnyis ka nye bar bkod do //
analyzed: rigs pa dang lung rkyang pa dag tshad ma yin pa'i phyir gnyis ka nye bar bkod do //
translated: Both are stated because reasoning and scripture alone are valid cognitions.

original: 'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: 'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Because it is similar to a stream of grain.

original: gal te 'chi ba'i srid pa kho na las yul gzhan dag tu skye ba'i srid pa 'byung bar 'dod na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'chi ba'i srid pa kho na las yul gzhan dag tu skye ba'i srid pa 'byung bar 'dod na ni /
translated: If you assert that the birth existence in another place arises from the death existence alone,

original: de lta na skye ba'i srid pa mi srid pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na skye ba'i srid pa mi srid pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, it would follow that birth existence would be impossible,

original: rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be a continuum.

original: 'di ltar rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i dngos po rnams ni chad nas yul gzhan dag tu 'byung bar ma mthong ste /üîΩdper na 'bru'i @272a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i dngos po rnams ni chad nas yul gzhan dag tu 'byung bar ma mthong ste / dper na 'bru'i @272a * //
translated: Thus, things that are a continuum are not seen to occur in another place after being interrupted.

original: rgyun du gtogs pa'i 'bru'i 'bras bu rnams rgyun du 'brel pas rgyas pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyun du gtogs pa'i 'bru'i 'bras bu rnams rgyun du 'brel pas rgyas pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the rice grains in a rice pot are extended by the rice grains in the continuum being connected to the continuum.

original: 'di dag la rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i ngang tshul yod pa na rgyun gyis 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag la rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i ngang tshul yod pa na rgyun gyis 'jug pa'o //
translated: Those that have the nature of being a continuum are a continuum.

original: yul gzhan dag tu zhes smos pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyun gyis ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yul gzhan dag tu zhes smos pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyun gyis ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Since it is said ‚Äúin another place,‚Äù it is not indefinite because of the continuum of mind,

original: 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba las ldang ba'i sems yod pa na dus gzhan du chad pa ni yul de kho nar skye ba'i yul gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba las ldang ba'i sems yod pa na dus gzhan du chad pa ni yul de kho nar skye ba'i yul gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when the mind that arises from the meditative attainment of cessation or the meditative attainment of nonperception exists, it is not interrupted for another time, but it is interrupted in that very place, not in another place.

original: chad nas 'byung ba yang mthong ste zhes bya ba rgyas bar 'byung ba la me long la sogs pa dag gi nang du gzugs te bzhin las gzugs brnyan te bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba mthong ngo zhes 'dis ni ma nges par rjod par byed do //
analyzed: chad nas 'byung ba yang mthong ste zhes bya ba rgyas bar 'byung ba la me long la sogs pa dag gi nang du gzugs te bzhin las gzugs brnyan te bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba mthong ngo zhes 'dis ni ma nges par rjod par byed do //
translated: It is also seen that an effect arises after the cessation of its cause.üîΩThis is what he says, but he is not certain. He sees that a reflection of a form, such as a face, arises in a mirror, etc., but he is not certain that the reflection is a real thing.üîΩHe is not certain because the reflection is not established.

original: gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir ba dang // zhes pa 'dis ni ma nges pa ltar snang pa nyid du ston par byed do //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir ba dang // zhes pa 'dis ni ma nges pa ltar snang pa nyid du ston par byed do //
translated: This is what he says, but he is not certain.

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the phenomena that have an object?

original: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so //
translated: The mind and mental factors.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the phenomena that do not have an object?üîΩForm, the unconditioned, and the non-associated.

original: gzugs dang 'dus ma byas dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams so zhes bstan bcos las 'byung bas gzugs brnyan sems dang sems las byung ba'i dmigs pa len pa'i phyir yod do zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs dang 'dus ma byas dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams so zhes bstan bcos las 'byung bas gzugs brnyan sems dang sems las byung ba'i dmigs pa len pa'i phyir yod do zhe na /
translated: Since this is stated in the treatise, a reflection exists because it is the object of the mind and mental factors.

original: 'di'i lan gyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di'i lan gyi phyir /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin //
analyzed: mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin //
translated: It is not an example because it is not similar.

original: zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩkha dog gi khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so // kha dog gi khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus, he says.üîΩAnother color-difference.

original: me long gi kha dog las gzhan pa ni kha dog gi khyad par gzhan no //
analyzed: me long gi kha dog las gzhan pa ni kha dog gi khyad par gzhan no //
translated: Another color-difference is a color-difference other than the color of the mirror.

original: tshig tsam gyis dad par mi 'gyur bas 'dri ba ni re zhig ji ltar ma grub ce na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshig tsam gyis dad par mi 'gyur bas 'dri ba ni re zhig ji ltar ma grub ce na zhes bya'o //
translated: Since one does not come to believe through mere words, he asks, ‚ÄúHow is it not established?‚Äù

original: yul de nyid na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yul de nyid na zhes bya ba la /
translated: In that very place.

original: zur na gnas pas me long gi yul de nyid na me long gi gzugs mthong gi gzugs brnyan ma yin la /
analyzed: zur na gnas pas me long gi yul de nyid na me long gi gzugs mthong gi gzugs brnyan ma yin la /
translated: One who is standing to the side sees the form of the mirror in that very place of the mirror, but not the reflection.

original: mdun na gnas pas gzugs brnyan mthong gi me long gi gzugs ma yin te /
analyzed: mdun na gnas pas gzugs brnyan mthong gi me long gi gzugs ma yin te /
translated: One who is standing in front sees the reflection, but not the form of the mirror.

original: de ltar bsdoms pas der gnyis ka snang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar bsdoms pas der gnyis ka snang ngo //
translated: Thus, when combined, both appear there.

original: gzhan dag na re mdun du phyogs pas gnyis ka mthong ngo zhes zer te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re mdun du phyogs pas gnyis ka mthong ngo zhes zer te /
translated: Others say that one sees both when facing it.

original: de'i phyir me long gcig na snang ba gnyis lhan cig tu mi srid pa'i phyir de na me long gi gzugs las gzhan gzugs brnyan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir me long gcig na snang ba gnyis lhan cig tu mi srid pa'i phyir de na me long gi gzugs las gzhan gzugs brnyan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is not possible for two appearances to exist simultaneously in one mirror, the reflection does not exist there as something other than the form of the mirror.

original: rten gyi 'byung ba tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rten gyi 'byung ba tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because the primary elements that are its support are different.

original: de gnyis kyi rten gyi 'byung ba rnams ni tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: de gnyis kyi rten gyi 'byung ba rnams ni tha dad pa yin la /
translated: The primary elements that are the support of those two are different.

original: me long gi gzugs kyi rten gyi 'byung ba rnams kyis bzung ba'i yul de na gzugs @272b brnyan gyi gzugs kyi rten gyi 'byung ba rnams kyi go yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: me long gi gzugs kyi rten gyi 'byung ba rnams kyis bzung ba'i yul de na gzugs @272b brnyan gyi gzugs kyi rten gyi 'byung ba rnams kyi go yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And the space occupied by the primary elements that are the support of the reflected image is not occupied by the primary elements that are the support of the form of the face.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they possess resistance.

original: de'i phyir de na rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gnyis lhan cig 'byung ba ni med do //üîΩde bzhin du phyogs gzhan na gnas pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la phyogs tha dad pa na gnas pa'i skyes bu gcig gi rgyab kyi shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i gzugs ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang de kho na
analyzed: de'i phyir de na rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gnyis lhan cig 'byung ba ni med do // de bzhin du phyogs gzhan na gnas pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la phyogs tha dad pa na gnas pa'i skyes bu gcig gi rgyab kyi shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i gzugs ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang de kho na
translated: Therefore, two derivative forms do not occur simultaneously.üîΩSimilarly, those who stand in other directions see the form of the tree, etc.

original: ltar yin no //
analyzed: ltar yin no //
translated: in the same way that those who stand behind the man do.

original: de la gcig gis ni rang gi mdun rol gyi yul na gnas pa'i shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs kyi /
analyzed: de la gcig gis ni rang gi mdun rol gyi yul na gnas pa'i shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs kyi /
translated: One of these sees the reflection of a form such as a tree that exists in the field in front of it.üîΩ

original: rgyab na gnas pa'i ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyab na gnas pa'i ma yin la /
translated: One sees the reflection of the form of a tree, etc., that is situated in the place in front of oneself, but not that which is situated behind.

original: cig shos kyis kyang mtshe'u'i chu'i yul de nyid du de kho na ltar dmigs so //
analyzed: cig shos kyis kyang mtshe'u'i chu'i yul de nyid du de kho na ltar dmigs so //
translated: The other sees it in the same place, in the water of the pond.

original: gal te de na chu'i gzugs ltar gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs dag kyang yod na ni gzugs thun mong ba yin pas thams cad kyi chu'i gzugs ltar ci'i phyir ma dmigs /
analyzed: gal te de na chu'i gzugs ltar gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs dag kyang yod na ni gzugs thun mong ba yin pas thams cad kyi chu'i gzugs ltar ci'i phyir ma dmigs /
translated: If the form of the reflection were to exist there, in the water, just as the form of the water exists, then, since the form would be common, why would not everyone see the form of the water?

original: dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not seen.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni 'khrul pa tsam zhig yin gyi gzugs gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni 'khrul pa tsam zhig yin gyi gzugs gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is a mere error, and not another form.

original: de'i phyir gzugs gcig la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs gcig la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚Äúin one form.‚Äù

original: bum pa'am snam bu'i gzugs gcig la skyes bu'i lta ba pho gnyis kyis lhan cig mi mthong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa'am snam bu'i gzugs gcig la skyes bu'i lta ba pho gnyis kyis lhan cig mi mthong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Two people do not see simultaneously the one form of a pot or a piece of cloth.

original: mthong ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthong ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they do see it.

original: 'dir ni lhan cig mthong ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni lhan cig mthong ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But here, they are not seen together.

original: de'i phyir der gzugs gzhan zhig 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir der gzugs gzhan zhig 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that another form arises there.

original: yang grib ma dang nyi ma gnyis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba la /
analyzed: yang grib ma dang nyi ma gnyis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba la /
translated: Moreover, it is also contradictory that both the sun and the shade are seen in a mirror.

original: gang gi tshe me long grib ma na 'dug cing bsgribs pa ma yin ba'i tshe der nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan snang la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe me long grib ma na 'dug cing bsgribs pa ma yin ba'i tshe der nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan snang la /
translated: When the mirror is in the shade and not covered, the reflection of the sun appears there.

original: nyi ma la 'dug pa la grib ma snang na /
analyzed: nyi ma la 'dug pa la grib ma snang na /
translated: When the mirror is in the sun, the shade appears.

original: nyi ma dang grib ma dag ni lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma dang grib ma dag ni lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory for the sun and the shade to exist together.

original: khron pa'i chu bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: khron pa'i chu bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
translated: Like the water in a well.

original: ji ltar khron pa'i chu gting ring po na yod par snang ba de bzhin du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang gzhan kho na yod par snang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar khron pa'i chu gting ring po na yod par snang ba de bzhin du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang gzhan kho na yod par snang ngo //
translated: Just as the water in a well appears to be deep, so the reflection of the moon appears to be elsewhere.

original: de yang de'i nang du 'byung na ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yang de'i nang du 'byung na ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: If it arises in that place,

original: gzugs brnyan de yang me long gi nang kho nar byung na ni /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de yang me long gi nang kho nar byung na ni /
translated: if that reflection arises only in the mirror,

original: de me long gi gzugs ltar gzhan na ste /
analyzed: de me long gi gzugs ltar gzhan na ste /
translated: like the reflection of a form in a mirror.

original: de'i nang las gzhan na dmigs par mi 'gyur na dmigs pa yang yin te /
analyzed: de'i nang las gzhan na dmigs par mi 'gyur na dmigs pa yang yin te /
translated: If it were not perceived as existing in the collection, then it would not be perceived at all.

original: de'i phyir de ni cung zad kyang med do //üîΩgal te de cung zad kyang med na 'o na de @273a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni cung zad kyang med do // gal te de cung zad kyang med na 'o na de @273a * //
translated: Therefore, it does not exist in the slightest.

original: ji ltar snang zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar snang zhe na /
translated: If it does not exist in the slightest, then how does it appear?

original: de'i phyir gang de ltar snang ba de ni tshogs pa de'i mthu de 'dab yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang de ltar snang ba de ni tshogs pa de'i mthu de 'dab yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThe appearance of that is the power of the collection.‚Äù

original: mthu dang nus pa dang / nus mthu zhes bya ba ni don gcig go //
analyzed: mthu dang nus pa dang / nus mthu zhes bya ba ni don gcig go //
translated: Power, ability, and capacity have the same meaning.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: chos rnams kyi mthu zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi mthu zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúThe power of phenomena is like this.‚Äù

original: ji ltar mig ser gyis mig nyams par byas pas thams cad du ser por mthong la /
analyzed: ji ltar mig ser gyis mig nyams par byas pas thams cad du ser por mthong la /
translated: For example, when the eye is damaged by jaundice, everything is seen as yellow.

original: rab rib can gyis zla ba gnyis su mthong ba dang / ji ltar khab long kho nas lcags thag 'dren gyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa dang / zla ba shar na chu shel kho na las chu 'byung gi / sol ba la sogs pa dag las ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: rab rib can gyis zla ba gnyis su mthong ba dang / ji ltar khab long kho nas lcags thag 'dren gyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa dang / zla ba shar na chu shel kho na las chu 'byung gi / sol ba la sogs pa dag las ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: and just as water appears only from a crystal globe but not from charcoal and so on,

original: gzugs gzhan med kyang mig dang me long gi ngos dang de bzhin gyi gzugs la brten nas de'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa can gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs gzhan med kyang mig dang me long gi ngos dang de bzhin gyi gzugs la brten nas de'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa can gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yin no //
translated: so too, even though another form does not exist, a visual consciousness possessing the aspect of that form arises in dependence on the eye, the mirror surface, and the form.

original: rgyun min phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: rgyun min phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Because it is not a continuum,

original: gal te gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rgyun gyi khongs su gtogs pa yin na ni me long gi rgyu dang ma 'brel par gzugs dang 'brel ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rgyun gyi khongs su gtogs pa yin na ni me long gi rgyu dang ma 'brel par gzugs dang 'brel ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: if a reflection were included in the continuum of form, it would arise in dependence only on form, not in dependence on a cause such as a mirror.

original: gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa ni gzhan gyi rgyud dang 'brel te 'byung bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa ni gzhan gyi rgyud dang 'brel te 'byung bar mi rigs so //
translated: It is illogical that what is included in another‚Äôs continuum would arise in dependence on another‚Äôs continuum.

original: me long gi rgyud dang 'brel pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la /üîΩgzugs brnyan gyi gzugs kyi rgyun du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: me long gi rgyud dang 'brel pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la / gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs kyi rgyun du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: Because it is related to the mirror.

original: me long dang 'brel pa'i phyir me long gi gzugs bzhin no //
analyzed: me long dang 'brel pa'i phyir me long gi gzugs bzhin no //
translated: The reflection is not a continuum of form because it is related to the mirror, like the form of the mirror itself.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir yang gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rgyun ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir yang gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rgyun ma yin te /
translated: Also, the reflection is not a continuum of form because it arises simultaneously with the form of the body.

original: gang zhig gang gi rgyun yin pa de ni lhan cig 'byung bar ma mthong ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rgyun yin pa de ni lhan cig 'byung bar ma mthong ste /
translated: We never see that which is simultaneous as a continuum,

original: dper na sa bon dang myu gu bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon dang myu gu bzhin no //
translated: like a seed and a sprout.

original: ji ltar 'chi ba'i srid pa'i rgyun skye ba'i srid pa lta bur te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'chi ba'i srid pa'i rgyun skye ba'i srid pa lta bur te /
translated: For example, the continuum of the existence at death arises as the existence at birth,

original: de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: but those two do not arise simultaneously.

original: rgyun la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /üîΩrgyun gyis 'jug pa'i 'bru dper brjod pa la /
analyzed: rgyun la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i 'bru dper brjod pa la /
translated: The opponent says:üîΩThe example of a seed and a sprout is an example of a continuum that is not simultaneous.

original: gzugs brnyan rgyun du gyur pa ma yin pas phyir bzlog pas dpe mi 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan rgyun du gyur pa ma yin pas phyir bzlog pas dpe mi 'dra ba yin no //
translated: The reflection is not a continuum of form because it is not a continuum, so the example is not similar.

original: gzugs brnyan ni gnyis las 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /üîΩgnyis las 'byung ba ni gnyis las 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni gnyis las 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / gnyis las 'byung ba ni gnyis las 'byung ba ste /
translated: The reflection arises from two,üîΩbecause it arises from two.

original: gnyis las 'byung ba de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis las 'byung ba de'i phyir ro //
translated: Arising from two is arising from two things.

original: gtso bo'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni me long la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gtso bo'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni me long la sogs pa ste /
translated: The primary cause is the mirror, etc.

original: de'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar gal te ral @273b gri bsags kar bsnyal te 'dug pa yin na ni gzugs brnyan yang bsags kar ring bar snang la /
analyzed: de'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro // 'di ltar gal te ral @273b gri bsags kar bsnyal te 'dug pa yin na ni gzugs brnyan yang bsags kar ring bar snang la /
translated: because the reflection is a transformation of that.üîΩThus, if the mirror is placed on a slope, the reflection appears as if on a slope.

original: gal te gyen la bsgreng ste 'dug pa yin na ni gzugs brnyan yang de ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: gal te gyen la bsgreng ste 'dug pa yin na ni gzugs brnyan yang de ltar snang ngo //
translated: If the mirror is placed upright, the reflection appears upright.

original: rgyu gnyis pa gtso bo ma yin pa khu chu dang khrag la sogs pa yod do zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu gnyis pa gtso bo ma yin pa khu chu dang khrag la sogs pa yod do zhe na /

translated: It is impossible for one who is not established in vigilance to have a body and faculties that are not strong, impaired, incomplete, and weak, and for that to occur through vigilance.

original: log pa'i 'du shes dang mos pa dag ces bya ba la /

original: mos pa ni lhag par smos pa'o //
analyzed: mos pa ni lhag par smos pa'o //

original: yang ji ltar log pa dag tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar log pa dag tu 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: gal te rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro'o zhes sngar bstan zin pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: rlung langs pa'am char 'bab pa'am zhes rgyas par yang ci'i phyir smos she na /

original: nges pa med bar shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nges pa med bar shes par bya ba'i phyir te /

original: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gnyis kho nas blo phyin ci log tu gyur pas skye ba'i yul du 'gro ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gnyis kho nas blo phyin ci log tu gyur pas skye ba'i yul du 'gro ba ma yin gyi /

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /

analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du rtsva thi bas po'am /

analyzed: lo ma'i spyi la por 'jug pa 'am zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yang yin te /

original: de ltar bshad na /
analyzed: de ltar bshad na /

analyzed: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //

original: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun //

analyzed: rab tu 'byed pa byas pa yang yin no //

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /

analyzed: thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i shes pa rdzogs pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: 'jug pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med de /

analyzed: 'di ltar 'ga' yang shes bzhin ma yin par zhugs nas shes bzhin du gnas pa'am 'byung pa ni med do //

analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i sgras gnas pa dang 'byung ba yang brjod do //

analyzed: da ni 'dir phyi rol pa can rnams zhes bya ba 'byung ste //

analyzed: ji lta zhe na /

analyzed: gal te sems can zhes bya ba rgyas par smras te /

analyzed: de dgag pa'i phyir dang po'i phyogs dang 'gal lo zhes @284a * //

analyzed: 'dri ba ni bdag ji lta bu zhig ce na zhes bya ba ste /

original: ci phung po tsam gyi bdag nyid can zhig gam /
analyzed: ci phung po tsam gyi bdag nyid can zhig gam /

original: 'on te nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu zhig ces bya ba'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir gang phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //

original: skye ba'i cha pa dag go //
analyzed: skye ba'i cha pa dag go //
translated: ‚ÄúOne who links with others‚Äù refers to those in the intermediate state or those who are about to be born.üîΩThe Blessed One said, ‚ÄúIt is like this. . . .‚Äù

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du zhes bya bas lung las kyang nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu med par bstan te /

analyzed: rigs pa las de med par ni / dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir //

analyzed: zhes bya ba der bshad zin to //
